00009 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00010 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00011 #include <QFormLayout>
00012 #include <QRegExpValidator>
00013 #include <QRegExp>
00014 #include <QSizePolicy>
00015 
00016 BusDefGroup::BusDefGroup(QWidget *parent): 
00017 QGroupBox(tr("General (Bus Definition)"), parent),
00018 busDef_(),
00019 directConnection_(tr("Used only between regular and bus components"), this),
00020 isAddressable_(tr("Does not include addressing"), this),
00021 maxMasters_(this),
00022 maxSlaves_(this) {
00023 
00024         QFormLayout* masterLayout = new QFormLayout();
00025         masterLayout->addRow(tr("Max masters:"), &maxMasters_);
00026 
00027         QFormLayout* slaveLayout = new QFormLayout();
00028         slaveLayout->addRow(tr("Max slaves:"), &maxSlaves_);
00029 
00030 //      QFormLayout* lineLayout = new QFormLayout();
00031 //      lineLayout->addRow(tr("Max masters"), &maxMasters_);
00032 //      lineLayout->addRow(tr("Max slaves"), &maxSlaves_);
00033 
00034         QHBoxLayout* topLayout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00035         topLayout->addWidget(&directConnection_);
00036         topLayout->addWidget(&isAddressable_);
00037         topLayout->addLayout(masterLayout);
00038         topLayout->addLayout(slaveLayout);
00039         topLayout->addStretch();
00040 
00041         QRegExp regExp(QString("[0-9]*"), Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::W3CXmlSchema11);
00042         QRegExpValidator* validator = new QRegExpValidator(regExp, this);
00043         maxMasters_.setValidator(validator);
00044         maxSlaves_.setValidator(validator);
00045 
00046         maxMasters_.setMaximumWidth(45);
00047         maxMasters_.setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::Minimum);
00048         maxSlaves_.setMaximumWidth(45);
00049         maxSlaves_.setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::Minimum);
00050         
00051         connect(&maxMasters_, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00052                 this, SLOT(onMastersChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053         connect(&maxSlaves_, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00054                 this, SLOT(onSlavesChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055          
00056         connect(&directConnection_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00057                 this, SLOT(onDirectConnectionChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058         connect(&isAddressable_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00059                 this, SLOT(onIsAddressableChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060 }

00062 BusDefGroup::~BusDefGroup() {
00063 }
00064 
00065 void BusDefGroup::setBusDef( QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef ) {
00066         busDef_ = busDef;
00067 
00068         // set value for direct connection check box
00069         if (busDef_->getDirectConnection())
00070                 directConnection_.setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00071         else
00072                 directConnection_.setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00073 
00074         // set value for is addressable check box
00075         if (busDef_->getIsAddressable())
00076                 isAddressable_.setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00077         else
00078                 isAddressable_.setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00079 
00080         // set value for the max masters line edit
00081         if (busDef_->getMaxMasters() < 0)
00082                 maxMasters_.setText(QString());
00083         else 
00084                 maxMasters_.setText(QString::number(busDef_->getMaxMasters()));
00085 
00086         // set value for the max slaves line edit
00087         if (busDef_->getMaxSlaves() < 0)
00088                 maxSlaves_.setText(QString());
00089         else
00090                 maxSlaves_.setText(QString::number(busDef_->getMaxSlaves()));
00091 }
00092 
00093 void BusDefGroup::onDirectConnectionChanged( int state ) {
00094 
00095         // if user unchecked the box
00096         if (state == Qt::Unchecked) 
00097                 busDef_->setDirectConnection(true);
00098         else 
00099                 busDef_->setDirectConnection(false);
00100 
00101         emit contentChanged();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void BusDefGroup::onIsAddressableChanged( int state ) {
00105         
00106         // if user unchecked the box
00107         if (state == Qt::Unchecked) 
00108                 busDef_->setIsAddressable(true);
00109         else 
00110                 busDef_->setIsAddressable(false);
00111 
00112         emit contentChanged();
00113 }
00114 
00115 void BusDefGroup::onMastersChanged() {
00116         QString text = maxMasters_.text();
00117 
00118         // if was not set
00119         if (text.isEmpty()) 
00120                 busDef_->setMaxMasters(-1);
00121 
00122         // convert text to number
00123         else
00124                 busDef_->setMaxMasters(text.toInt());
00125 
00126         emit contentChanged();
00127 }
00128 
00129 void BusDefGroup::onSlavesChanged() {
00130         QString text = maxSlaves_.text();
00131 
00132         // if was not set
00133         if (text.isEmpty())
00134                 busDef_->setMaxSlaves(-1);
00135 
00136         // convert text to number
00137         else
00138                 busDef_->setMaxSlaves(text.toInt());
00139 
00140         emit contentChanged();
00141 }
